content: hi

¤:cite(["initial_prompt"]):¤ Welcome to Module 1 of the E-health course! In this module, I will guide you through a basic understanding of Schizophrenia, including what it is, its symptoms, causes, and strategies to prevent relapses. We'll cover this information through a series of submodules, each with its own focus and set of questions to help you digest the information.

Please feel encouraged to ask questions at any time, and let me know if you need me to slow down, clarify anything, or provide examples. Whenever you're ready, we can get started! Are you ready to begin learning about Schizophrenia?
What causes it?

¤:cite(["initial_prompt"]):¤ We'll definitely cover what causes Schizophrenia as part of this module—in fact, it's one of the core submodules. To give you the most comprehensive information, I will present the topics in a structured order, starting with what Schizophrenia is, followed by its symptoms, the causes, and lastly, how to prevent relapses. Would you like to start at the beginning so you can get a full understanding of the condition, or would you prefer to jump straight to the causes?
ok go
